DOC.brief_summary: To assess the efficacy of oral aliskiren as a therapy for diabetic macular edema
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Aliskiren in the Treatment of Diabetic Macular Edema
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Type 1 or type 2 diabetes Diabetic macular edema Exclusion criteria: Recent intraocular surgery in the study eye (e.g., cataract surgery in the last 6 months) Recent laser photocoagulation in the study eye Recent treatment with Avastin, Lucentis, or intravitreal corticosteroids in the study eye Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria applied
